Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis

Synopsis Functions for creating visualizations.
Details Render Figure TestVis
Description The Rascal visualisation libraries provide a compositional visualization framework and consists of:
  • The library Figure that defines the basic visualization infrastructure.
  • The library ??ambiguous: Rascal:Render?? that defines the rendering of figures to a screen or file.
